long_description: The Pelican 1200 case is one of the toughest watertight equipment-protector cases available. Protects your camera, portable electronic gear and other sensitive equipment from moisture damage to 1m under water for up to 30 minutes. Pre-scored foam inside allows you to customize case to protect your valuables. Made of a lightweight, space-age structural resin. Features an atmospheric purge valve, neoprene O-ring seal and fold-down handle.
short_description: The Pelican 1200 case is one of the toughest watertight equipment-protector cases available.
